full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: ECCC Advertising Campaigns

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3861621746
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-09
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-16T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)

#### Service Requirements

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a lead marketing and advertising creative agency to provide strategic campaign direction, develop creative strategy, and manage production to support its mandate. The agency will collaborate with Agency of Record for advertising activities, offering strategic oversight and advice. Other services required include:

* Advertising creative strategy, production, and trafficking
* Strategic marketing advice and development of non-advertising tactics

#### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this proposal will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Delivery Regions

* Canada
* Ottawa
* Gatineau

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Jacoby Metellus (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [jacoby.metellus@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jacoby.metellus@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL

Please refer to the following URL for full procurement details: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15359418?extsite=MTUzNTk0MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.
